name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NeoTube - The next generation of YouTube™

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open your comments history directly from YouTube interface. It's just a beginning of a YouTube for users, not just for business.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NeoTube enhances your YouTube experience by providing a straightforward way to view your comment history. Designed for ease and efficiency, it integrates directly into YouTube, allowing you to quickly access and review your past comments.

This is just the first feature we are shipping, more to come soon. 
Our goal is to make YouTube a joy for its users and content creators, not just for business.

Features:
- Direct comment access -  Instantly view your YouTube comment history.
- Seamless integration - Blends into your YouTube interface for a natural, user-friendly experience.
- Privacy-focused - Operates without storing personal data, ensuring your privacy is respected.
---
